duties_responsibilities.duty: Review and post payroll and benefit journal entries.
Prepare monthly budget variance analysis and corrections/reclass entries.
Assist in annual budget preparation and documentation of internal controls and procedures.
Reconcile intercompany accounts for multiple entities and prepare monthly consolidated financial statements.
Assist with year-end audit, tax preparation, and account reconciliations.
Assist in the preparation of rolling cash report and forecast, as well as partner reporting.
Cross-train into Accounts Payable and cash deposit functions, provide AP Automation project support, and assume other related duties as requested.

education_certification.credential: B.S. in Accounting and/or finance preferred. Rising seniors are encouraged to apply.
